biography:
Jean-François Stévenin (23 April 1944 – 27 July 2021) was a French actor and filmmaker. He has appeared in 150 films and television shows since 1968. He starred in the film Cold Moon, which was entered into the 1991 Cannes Film Festival.

Source: Article "Jean-François Stévenin" from Wikipedia in english, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
name: Jean-François Stévenin
